response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to us and its significance to you, we're offering it to you for $14,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and what we believe represents a reasonable investment for you. We're confident this product will add substantial value to your endeavors. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
